settings.heading: Fit & Size Guide
settings.subcontent: We've created a guide that will help you find the right fit and size of our product, making it easier for you to make the perfect choice.
settings.fit_description:
Formal Shirt - Tailored Fit

Ideal for average builds and those who want a slightly tailored, yet flexible fit.

  1. Slightly tapered at the waist
  2. Slimmer sleeves for a neat silhouette
  3. Comfortably fitted around the shoulders.
